analyzed: zhe sdang yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of anger and the purity of birth are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they distinct.

original: zhe sdang yongs su dag pas rga shi yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: zhe sdang yongs su dag pas rga shi yongs su dag pa /
translated: “The purity of anger is the purity of old age and death.

original: rga shi yongs su dag pas zhe sdang yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: rga shi yongs su dag pas zhe sdang yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Anger is pure because old age and death are pure.

original: de ltar na /🔽zhe sdang yongs su dag pa dang / rga shi yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na / zhe sdang yongs su dag pa dang / rga shi yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus,🔽anger being pure and old age and death being pure are not two, nor are they divided, nor do they make distinctions.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;zhe sdang yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;zhe sdang yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas zhe sdang yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The perfection of generosity being pure, anger is pure.
